author: chfast
content: We received very little feedback from ZK world about EOF although we asked some individuals. I don't see how such restriction could be deployed globally, but some additional tagging seems doable. Provided ZK proof can handle function calls.

author: sky.cactus
content: I haven't really thought through it fully.  The idea would be to at least partition the contract space between "zk provable" contracts and "zk-unprovnable" contracts.  Maybe in the future we can provide different levels of service, performance, or cost depending on which type of contracts you interact with.
